Error_Summary: Asset missing or server redirected to index.html
Technical_Root_Cause: Single Page Application (SPA) routing on the web server intercepted fetch() requests to the plugin source directories
Resolution_Applied: Switching to Vite Raw Asset Loading (?raw) to embed file content directly into the JavaScript bundle at build time.

Technical_Root_Cause: Browser blocked requests because the frontend and backend were on different domains and required credentialed handshakes
Resolution_Applied: Updated apiFetch to use credentials: 'include' and ensured server-side CORS headers echoed the specific requesting origin.

Technical_Root_Cause: Apache and LiteSpeed servers were stripping the HTTP Authorization header before it reached the WordPress REST API
Resolution_Applied: Implemented a specific .htaccess rewrite rule to capture the header and pass it into an environment variable.

Technical_Root_Cause: The MCO_JWT_SECRET in the WordPress backend did not match the key used to sign the token stored in the browser
Resolution_Applied: Implemented a 'Hard Reset' function in the Login component to purge localStorage and force a fresh SSO handshake.

Technical_Root_Cause: Question datasets failed to load because the linked Google Sheet was not 'Published to Web' as a CSV
Resolution_Applied: Updated the Test component to provide specific diagnostic messaging for private vs. invalid spreadsheet URLs.

Technical_Root_Cause: html2canvas was unable to capture external logo images due to cross-origin security restrictions on the canvas
Resolution_Applied: Added crossOrigin="anonymous" attributes to img tags and provided base64 encoded fallbacks in localLogos.ts.

Technical_Root_Cause: The PHP importer skipped rows or failed due to UTF-8 BOM markers and trailing empty commas in the source CSV
Resolution_Applied: Added preg_replace logic to strip BOM markers and array_filter to validate row data integrity before processing.

Technical_Root_Cause: The React app crashed when pointed to a new domain before a configuration file existed in the /public directory
Resolution_Applied: Developed the 'Tenant Blueprint Generator' tool in the WordPress plugin to scaffold valid empty configurations for new deployments.

Error_Summary: Race Condition: regionProfiles is not defined
Technical_Root_Cause: A variable naming discrepancy between the local component state and the imported constants
Resolution_Applied: Standardized naming conventions and implemented strict TypeScript interfaces to catch discrepancies at compile time.

Technical_Root_Cause: Admin customizers crashed when attempting to map over null or undefined exam objects returned by the API
Resolution_Applied: Implemented nuclear defensive initialization in component state to provide virtual default objects if the backend data is incomplete.

Technical_Root_Cause: Potential for session tokens to be intercepted if transmitted via insecure channels
Resolution_Applied: Enforced HTTPS-only redirection and added a timestamp-based cache buster to all SSO redirect URLs.

Technical_Root_Cause: Users were unable to access premium content immediately after purchase due to server-side transient caching
Resolution_Applied: Implemented an automated cache purging hook (mco_invalidate_app_cache_on_save) that clears transients on WooCommerce order completion.
